name: Fiery Forest Frenzy
description:
Control your animal buddies to stop the out of control fire!

As the heroic forest sprite, you must inhabit the different animals to stop the fire. Deer can pick up and throw water bombs, beavers can chop down trees to create bridges (Or smother fires), and rabbits can leap large distances and kick any water bombs in their path. You'll need to use all of their abilities (And your ability to float) to push back the fire until the next season begins. If the fire spreads too much or ignites the cute fox stump, it's game over!

Controls

Click "Start Game" with the mouse or select with your standard selection button on your gamepad.

Keyboard and Mouse Controller Credits

Created by Sydney H and Calvin E.

Art by Sydney H.

Icons by Calvin E.

Sound effects from YouTube Audio Library.

Music provide by the following.
